A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After rewatching The Force Awakens\, I think the Fore Awakens was a more tightly-constructed film\, but ultimately it was still more or less a really well-made remake of A New Hope and Return of the Jedi. The Last Jedi was a little more uneven\, but so much more interesting and unique. I feel much more invested in both Rey and Kylo Ren than I did after watching The Force Awakens. I loved it!
